explains: n. 祖国，家乡；（某一特殊群体居住的）大片定居地
wordGroup: homeland security 国土安全；国家安全
department of homeland security 国土安全部

sentences.en: She severed her ties with her homeland.
sentences.cn: 她断绝了与自己祖国的联系。

sentences.en: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

sentences.en: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多难民被迫逃离了祖国。
